sections.text:
46-748.Rules and regulations.

The Chief Water Officer shall adopt and promulgate, in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act, such rules and regulations as are necessary to the discharge of duties assigned to the Chief Water Officer by the Nebraska Ground Water Management and Protection Act.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 108, § 68;Laws 2000, LB 900, § 215;R.S.Supp.,2002, § 46-656.62;Laws 2004, LB 962, § 88;Laws 2025, LB317, § 241.Operative Date: July 1, 2025

Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
